item.title: 5 Layer and 5 Tier Architecture
item.description: There are differences between N-layer and N-tier definitions. We can start with explaining those first: 5-layer Architecture Layering is logical separation that you implement in your application. It has a relation with N-Tier but we will move onto it later: ![img](/img/5-layout.png 5-layer) Presentation This is how your application is shown to the user. You can think about it is a look and feel of the application. But it is very similar to the UI layer, today’s world with the improvement of JavaScript (client-side-rendering solutions like React, Angular, etc.
